'''1.6.4 Build 1<ref name="blog">{{link |url=https://kulttuuri.tumblr.com/post/63722374453/minecraftedu-the-not-so-secret-friday-update|title=MinecraftEdu: the-not-so-secret-friday-update |date=October 11, 2013 |website=Tumblr|author=}}</ref>''' is the first build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.6.4, released on October 11, 2013. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.6.4]].

== Additions ==

=== Blocks ===
* Copy & Paste functionality to signs.
* Made big / small / copy / paste buttons as icons in edu sign edit GUI.

=== General ===
* Removed LWJGL version selection from launcher as latest version is now shipped by default.
* Server-side textures now compatible with new Resource Packs.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fire doesn't spread if Fire/TNT is disabled.
